record.name: Global Positioning System (GPS)
record.description: a system of satellites that use spread-spectrum transmission, operated by the US military for commercial and military applications
record.xref: "Navstar GPS Space Segment/Navigation User Interface," ICD GPS-200, Apr 2000.

record.name: Galileo
record.description: a system of satellites that operate in the same spectrum as GPS, operated by the European Union for commercial applications
record.xref: GJU, "Galileo Open Service Signal In Space Interface Control Document (SIS ICD)", May 2006.
